Name: Gingerbread 'Martini'
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of gingerbread or ginger cookie.
Garnish with gingerbread or ginger cookie rested on the rim.
Review: A soaking wet Vodka Martini with a festive dose of almond and gingerbread.
History: Created in December 2014 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England. Martini cocktail evolution and variantion
Nutrition: One serving of Gingerbread 'Martini' contains 221 calories
